p: At present, phlebotomine sandflies have broader range than the parasites. In Europe, support for the contribution of climate change on the distribution of sandflies is limited (Ready 2010), although in Italy climate change has been suspected as a potential factor for the documented northward shift of sandfly vectors (Maroli etÂ al. 2008). For central Europe, the current risk is projected to be low due to temperature restrictions on pathogen reproduction (Fischer, Thomas and Beierkuhnlein 2010).
